text: Adolphe Ambowodé (born 13 February 1958) is an athlete from the Central African Republic. He represented his country at the 1984 and 1988 Summer Olympics. ==Achievements== *All results regarding marathon, unless stated otherwise {| |- !colspan="5"|Representing |- |1984 |Olympic Games |Los Angeles, United States |70th |2:41:26 |- |1988 |Olympic Games |Seoul, South Korea |42nd |2:23:52 |} ==References== * Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Central African Republic male long-distance runners Category:Olympic athletes of the Central African Republic Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Central African Republic male marathon runners
title: Adolphe Ambowodé
